title: Suggestions for a similar blackletter?
content:
I'm searching for something along these lines to purchase. Or something close to this perhaps:

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:Calligraphy.malmesbury.bible.arp.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091908/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:Calligraphy.malmesbury.bible.arp.jpg "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:Calligraphy.malmesbury.bible.arp.jpg")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091908im_/http:/typophile.com/files/greatideasone5_4118.jpg)
author: roquestrew

comments.content: There is many of this font in this [page](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091908/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=401).
Always one second ahead :) or in this case 10 mins.
Thanks so much; Notre Dame is perfect!
